channel.title: Login Problem
channel.description:
I was trying to play on a server today and when I tried to log in it said "Error Connecting to Server". So I tired another one....It did the same thing. I am using the Combattscape client and I try to log in and says the same thing. Then I try one of ryry871's clients and it worked fine. Can someone please help me? I don't know what is going on here.
I think it might have to do something with my java.

item.title: Login Problem
